sent.orig: The OP:AP-STATUS, OP:AP-DS1x-STATUS, and OP:AP-RCSx-STATUS input messages also report the maintenance and diagnostic status of DS0s.
sent.trans: OP:AP-STATUS, OP:AP-DS1x-STATUS,和 OP:AP-RCSx-STATUS 输入消息也报告 DS0 的维护和诊断状态。

sent.orig: The system status, control station status and operation station status are expounded.
sent.trans: 并对系统状态、制站状态和操作站状态显示进行了阐述。

sent.orig: Supervise the production status and delivery status, comparing the actual status with the order.
sent.trans: 监控生产进度，发运计划的实施，比对客户订单的完成情况。

sent.orig: View your previously submitted status reports, saved status reports, and reminders for overdue status reports.
sent.trans: 查看以前提交的状态报告，已保存的状态报告以及对过期状态报告的提醒。

sent.orig: The AP Status Page and AP-DS1 Status Page both show the status of the DS1s.
sent.trans: AP 状态页和 AP-DS1 状态页都会显示 DS1 的状态。
